pinyin: tuo1 yang3 he2 tang2 he2 suan1

definition: to shed/to take off/to escape/to get away from
sour/tart/sick at heart/grieved/sore/aching/pedantic/impractical/to make sarcastic remarks about sb/an acid

sentences.english: What is the function of ligase in DNA replication?
sentences.chinese: 什么是连接酶的作用在脱氧核糖核酸复制的？

sentences.english: All sorts of mutational damage to animals' DNA would have occurred.
sentences.chinese: 动物的脱氧核糖核酸可能遭到了各种各样的突变破坏。

sentences.english: DNA told the body how to build proteins.
sentences.chinese: 脱氧核糖核酸告诉身体如何建立蛋白质。

sentences.english: DNA is the short form of deoxyribonucleic acid .
sentences.chinese: DNA是脱氧核糖核酸的缩写形式。

sentences.english: All sorts of mutational damage to animals' DNA would have occurred.
sentences.chinese: 脱氧核糖核酸可能遭到了各种各样的突变破坏。

sentences.english: The mutant DNＡ miscoded a single amino acid.
sentences.chinese: 突变体脱氧核糖核酸误编了一个氨基酸密码。

sentences.english: The mutant DNA miscoded a single amino acid.
sentences.chinese: 突变体脱氧核糖核酸误编了一个氨基酸密码。

sentences.english: Deoxyribonucleic acid is an important chemical substance in our life process.
sentences.chinese: 脱氧核糖核酸是生命过程中的重要化学物质。

sentences.english: Enzymes that cut deoxyribonucleic acid , DNA .
sentences.chinese: 切割脱氧核糖核酸的酶。

sentences.english: This thread of life, of course, is deoxyribonucleic acid.
sentences.chinese: 这一生命细丝当然就是脱氧核糖核酸。

pinyin: qu4 yang3 he2 tang2 he2 suan1

definition: thymine nucleotide (T, pairs with adenine A 腺嘌呤 in DNA)
cytosine nucleotide (C, pairs with guanine G 鳥嘌呤|鸟嘌呤 in DNA and RNA)
guanine nucleotide (G, pairs with cytosine C 胞嘧啶 in DNA and RNA)
